accounts.telegram.forward_request: 📨 Now, please forward any message from your channel.
accounts.telegram.instruction: 📢 To connect a Telegram channel: 1. Add this bot as admin to your public channel. 2. Then press the button below. After that, forward a message from your channel here and I’ll detect and save it.
accounts.telegram.not_channel: ❌ Please forward a message from a Telegram channel.
help: ℹ️ Available commands: 🚀 /start – start using the bot ❓ /help – show this help ⚙️ /settings – open account settings 👤 /about – your profile information 📌 Use the menu below to navigate
post.add.ai_error: ❌ Generation error. Try writing content manually.
post.add.no_accounts: ❌ You don't have any connected social media accounts. First add an account in the 'Socials' section.
post.add.theme_too_short: ⚠️ Theme is too short. Minimum 3 characters.
post.add.theme_too_long: ⚠️ Theme is too long. Maximum 50 characters.
post.add.choose_workflow: 🧠 Choose a workflow to create a post:
post.add.content_too_long: ⚠️ Content is too long. Maximum 4000 characters.
post.add.content_too_short: ⚠️ Content is too short. Minimum 10 characters.
post.add.error: ❌ Error creating post. Try again later.
post.add.free_post_created: ✅ Free post created! Free posts remaining: {remaining}
post.add.free_posts_exceeded: ❌ You have used all {limit} free posts. Get a subscription to create new posts.
post.add.limit_exceeded: [EN] ❌ Достигнут лимит постов по вашей подписке. Обновите план для создания новых постов.
post.add.method_prompt: How would you like to create content?
post.add.no_subscription: [EN] ❌ У вас нет активной подписки. Оформите подписку для создания постов.
post.add.no_workflows: ❌ You don't have any active workflows. Create a workflow first.
post.add.topic_prompt: 💡 Enter post topic (e.g., 'How to invest in ETF'):
post.add.topic_too_long: ⚠️ Topic is too long. Maximum 200 characters.
post.add.topic_too_short: ⚠️ Topic is too short. Minimum 5 characters.
post.edit.title: [EN] Редактирование поста
posts.none: 📝 You don't have any posts yet.
referral.already_exists: ❌ This code already exists. Try another one.
referral.already_has_referrer: You have already entered a referral code!
referral.cancelled: [EN] ❌ Ввод реферального кода отменен Вы можете попробовать позже в настройках.
referral.circular_referral: [EN] ❌ Циклическая реферальная связь! Нельзя пригласить пользователя, который вас пригласил. Введите другой код или нажмите "Отмена"
referral.code_not_found: [EN] ❌ Код не найден! Пользователь с таким реферальным кодом не существует. Проверьте код и попробуйте еще раз или нажмите "Отмена"
referral.code_taken: [EN] ❌ Код уже занят! Этот код уже используется другим пользователем. Попробуйте другой код или нажмите "Отмена"
referral.code_updated: [EN] ✅ Реферальный код обновлен! Ваш новый код: {code} Используйте его для приглашения друзей!
referral.enter_code: Enter new referral code (6-12 characters, letters and numbers only):
referral.error: ❌ Error updating code. Try again later.
referral.input_prompt: 🎫 Enter the referral code of the person who invited you If a friend invited you, ask them for their referral code. The code should be 8 characters and contain only uppercase letters and numbers. Example: ABC12345 Simply enter the code in the next message:
referral.invalid_format: ❌ Invalid code format. Use 6-12 characters, uppercase letters and numbers only.
referral.invite:
👥 Invite friends and get 10% from their payments!

🔗 Your link: {link}
referral.no_code_error: [EN] Ошибка: у вас нет реферального кода!
referral.same_code: [EN] ❌ Это ваш текущий код! Введите новый код или нажмите "Отмена"
referral.self_referral: [EN] ❌ Нельзя использовать свой код! Введите код другого пользователя или нажмите "Отмена"
referral.success: ✅ Referral link established! You were invited by: {referrer_name} Their referral code: {referral_code} 🎁 Your bonuses: 💰 +50 rubles to balance 📝 +1 free post Now the inviter will receive 10% from your payments!
referral.system_error: [EN] ❌ Системная ошибка! Произошла ошибка при установке реферальной связи. Попробуйте еще раз позже.
referral.title: 🎫 Referral code
referral.update_error: [EN] ❌ Ошибка при обновлении! Не удалось установить реферальную связь. Попробуйте еще раз позже.
referral.update_prompt: [EN] 🎫 Обновите ваш реферальный код Введите новый 8-символьный код для приглашения друзей. Код должен содержать только заглавные буквы и цифры. Пример: ABC12345
settings.email_change_prompt: Send new email or press Cancel
settings.none: You don't have any active workflows. Create one.
settings.referral_change_prompt: Press button to generate new code
settings.referral_error_info: [EN] Ошибка: реферальный код не был создан при регистрации
settings.referral_info: [EN] Используйте этот код для приглашения друзей
settings.title: ⚙️ Settings
start.referral_info: To use a referral code, use: /start CODE
subscription.title: 📦 Subscriptions and Balance Top-up
balance.title: 💰 Balance Top-up
balance.enter_amount:
Enter the amount to top up (in rubles):
Minimum: 100 rub.
Maximum: 10000 rub.
balance.success: ✅ Balance successfully topped up! 💰 Added: {amount} rub. 💳 New balance: {new_balance} rub.
balance.custom_prompt: ✏️ Enter the amount to top up Send a message with the amount in rubles. For example: 1500 Minimum: 100 rub. Maximum: 10000 rub.
subscription.no_plans: ❌ No subscription plans available There are no active tariff plans at the moment.
subscription.insufficient_balance: ❌ Insufficient funds 💰 Your balance: {balance} rub. 💳 Plan cost: {price} rub. Top up your balance to subscribe.
trial.allowed: 🧪 You can generate a trial post. You’ll be able to edit it before publishing.
trial.limit: ⚠️ Trial limit exceeded or you already have a subscription.
user_not_found: User not found. Please send /start to register.
welcome:
🌟 Welcome to AsleFlow!

👋 Nice to meet you, {name}!

🤖 I am your assistant for automating social media posts.

✨ Ready to help you make your publishing process more efficient!

📱 Use the menu to navigate or type /help for assistance.
workflow.add.choose_account: 📡 Choose an account to link the workflow:
workflow.add.choose_moderation: 🔎 Do you want to enable moderation for posts?
workflow.add.enter_name: 🧠 Enter the name of the workflow:
workflow.add.enter_theme: 🎯 Enter the topic for posts (e.g., finance, marketing):
workflow.add.enter_time: ⏰ Enter time for the first post (in HH:MM):
workflow.add.invalid_interval: ⚠️ Interval must be between 4 and 168 hours.
workflow.add.time_note:
⏰ The publishing time is set in GMT+0 (UTC).
For example, if you live in Moscow (GMT+3), enter 09:00 to publish the post at 12:00 local time.
workflow.edit.name: ✏️ Name
workflow.edit_interval_prompt: ⏱️ Enter new interval in hours (4 to 168):
